Older Workers Encourage the Younger Ones 


     The Lord desires His people to make constant advancement.  He rejoices when young men become imbued with His spirit, and gird on the armor, to engage in aggressive warfare.  Let us always encourage young men and young women to make the most of their capabilities, to improve their talents to the utmost, remembering the words, "Let no man despise thy youth."  We do not expect that they will never err in word or action, but if they will heed the reproofs of the Lord, and 
                                                                           48
correct every mistake, they will make advancement.
